sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>construction</radical> of an under<radical>ground</radical> <radical>prison</radical> will be done by someone who is <kanji>adept</kanji> at it.
meaningInfo: And that adept person is you! You're an expert when it comes to constructing underground prisons, so you've been hired for this job. Good luck!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Adept</kanji> at constructing underground prisons, you've caught the eye of Emperor <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>, the royal underground prison enthusiast.
readingInfo:
With a dignified nod, Emperor <ja>こういち</ja> entrusts you with the grand project of constructing an underground prison, confident that the adept builder will make prisoners feel right at home in their new subterranean digs.

Hint: When you see <ja>工</ja> in a kanji it will often take the <ja>こう</ja> reading.
